name: Pubudu Dassanayake
bio: Pubudu Bathiya Dassanayake (/dəsəˈnaɪəkə/ də-sə-NY-ə-kə; born 11 July 1970) is a former international cricketer who represented both Sri Lanka and Canada internationally,& currently the head coach of  Everest Premier League side Bhairahawa Gladiators.He was also the coach of the United States national team, having earlier served for periods as head coach of Canada and Nepal.[1]
